title: Pixel 4xl will not activate visual voicemail. message Activating Visual Voicemail for 6 weeks
content: I turn off visual voicemail and turn back on. I restart phone. I check the service with carrier (Verizon), it's on. Nothing works. I am able to retrieve VMs by calling but they do not show up on the phone
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
